main: ^Hello, you are also not from here I see.
^Yes, are you not from here? Who are you?
^You are weird I don't want to talk to you. Bye.
^I am just a passerby, don't worry.
greenstory: ^I am from a green tribe, we come here from time to time to trade with thlakahans, we don't drink atl and they don't like us very much but we value their craft. Last week one of them stole our bag with our parasitic seeds. I am looking for the thief.
^That's sad, but I don't have time to solve your problems now. Sorry.
seeds: ^We found parasite seeds that we can plant in our bodies. They allow us to photosynthesize so we don't need atl. It's pretty convenient but the folks here don't want to believe that it works. I have no idea why someone would steal them from me.
^Thank you for this story. It gave me an idea. I will find the thief!
